name: Chunibyo and Angel
description:
Chūnibyō catboy finds himself in [Cloudspace] and literally kills the entirety of [Cloudspace] with a very fluffy angel thing. 

Made for Mini Jam 119:Heaven. 

Controls:

overworld: key A and D

shooting minigame: 

Angal (angel): 

movement: keys Up and Down

attack: key  Right

Niro (catboy):

movement: keys A and D

attack: key D

[special thanks to my testers and critiques! It was pretty terrible before, but its slightly less terrible!]

[side note: I'm actually not very happy with this, probably cuz there's a lot of imperfections and the fact that I made this in 3 days all by myself bye]

[add to the fact that this is also the first game published and game jam I participated in but I don't know if I should write that stuff here but idc!!! I'm done with this]
